meanings.definition: A person or thing that squashes or crushes something.
meanings.sent1: The squashers at the recycling plant help to flatten the cans.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with those squashers, they can easily crush the delicate flowers.
meanings.sent3: The squashers in the garbage truck work hard to make the trash compact.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like emotional squashers, crushing his spirit.
meanings.sent5: The giant squashers in the car compactor made a loud noise as they flattened the vehicle.

meanings.definition: A device used for flattening or compressing something.
meanings.sent1: The squashers in the factory help to compress the metal sheets.
meanings.sent2: The hydraulic press is a powerful squashers used in manufacturing.
meanings.sent3: The squashers in the packaging machine work efficiently to flatten the boxes.
meanings.sent4: The squashers in the trash compactor made quick work of the cardboard boxes.
meanings.sent5: The giant squashers in the junkyard crushed the old cars effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a thick sole.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite squashers to protect her feet during the hike.
meanings.sent2: The squashers he wore were perfect for walking on rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: His bright yellow squashers stood out among the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The squashers she bought were comfortable and stylish.
meanings.sent5: The new squashers had a unique design on the sole that caught everyone's attention.
